attributes.action: Controlling supermarkets power over British farmers
attributes.additional_details:
This petition is for the government to make a law that protects British farmers from the controlling tactics used by the main supermarkets to keep their profits up by paying as little as possible or having such strict guidelines that has had a destructive effect on farmers lives.
Farmers should be paid fairly and given contracts that offer peace of mind, not ones that are just in favour of the supermarket.
